Posts.Content: Feb 3, 2012 01:19AM ILOVEMYMOTHER wrote: to evryone who has answered.  i feel a piece of calmness knowing i can talk to you.  i wish i could thank each and everyone of you by your name on each of your specifics but i too have problems with a disease, not cancer but RSD and its hard to tyoe. As i read and feel my heart warming to all of your replys and i feel blessed to have such people like yourselves.  its hard not to worry, but i will be with her every step of the way.  thank you from the bottom of my heart for sharing your stories. moira, you are an inspiration as well as everyone else and i am praying right now for each and everyone of you.  Dear Jesus, Thank You Lord that You protect these beautiful women including my mommy every day of their life, far more than I ever know. Thank You that You are more powerful than any cancer or risks they face. Thank You that You go before them whenever they go through difficult sitations.  Thank You that You are always with them and never leave or forsake them, so they dont need to be afraid of tough times.  Dear Father, please give them courage and faith to meet the most difficult situation they face in fighting and beating cancer.  In Jesus name I pray, Amen.  i love you my beautiful sisters in christ and I thank you.  I will keep you all updated on my mom after the tests have been given. xoxoxoxox
Posts.Title: HELP ME STOP CRYING!!!!!! ILOVEMYMOTHER sincitydealer
